components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: Connectivity Lost on ~5 % of Super SIM Devices

incident_updates.body: Beginning at 14:13 UTC, we observed ~5 % of active data sessions on Super SIM being dropped. Devices that attempted to reconnect immediately after losing connectivity should have been able to successfully reconnect to the redundant instances while the impacted one recovered. Our engineering team is actively working with the affected network provider to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or sooner once more information becomes available.
Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Super SIM. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to O2 Network in Germany

incident_updates.body: We are observing recovery in SMS delivery delays when sending messages to O2 Network in Germany. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to O2 Network in Germany. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to O2 Network in Germany. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to O2 Network in Germany. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to O2 Network in Germany. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing delays in receiving message delivery reports O2 Network in Germany. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Glomobile Network in Nigeria

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Glomobile Network in Nigeria. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Glomobile Network in Nigeria. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to experience MMS/SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Glomobile Network in Nigeria. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to experience MMS/SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Glomobile Network in Nigeria. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing MMS/SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Glomobile Network in Nigeria. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with SMS delivery delays to Glomobile Network in Nigeria. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

We continue investigating an elevated rate of 500 errors for some Twilio Websites in Europe. Our engineers are working on the issue, and we will provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue investigating an elevated rate of 500 errors for some Twilio Websites in Europe. Our engineers are working on the issue, and we will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are currently investigating an elevated rate of 500 errors for some Twilio Websites in Europe. Our engineers are working on the issue, and we will provide another update in  1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with 500 errors for some Twilio pages. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Malaysia SMS Carrier Maintenance - XOX Com(Red One)

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The XOX Com(Red One) network in Malaysia is conducting a planned maintenance from 19 June 2023 at 09:00 PDT until 19 June 2023 at 11:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from XOX Com(Red One) Malaysia handsets.

The Viettel network in the Vietnam is conducting a planned maintenance from 19 June 2023 at 10:00 PDT until 19 June 2023 at 14:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Viettel Vietnam handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Global Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - 3ID

incident_updates.body:
Our Global Carrier Partner 3ID is conducting an emergency maintenance from 19 June 2023 at 10:30 PDT until 19 June 2023 at 14:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for the following destinations: Indonesia.
Impacted Products - Carrier
Silent Network Authentication (SNA) - 3 Indonesia.
